import { useRef } from "react"; import "./about.css"; export default function About() { return ( <>

About this blog

MEET SARAH

Sarah Green lives in Berlin with her cat Voltaire. Sarah is a 25-year-old medical student who enjoys vandalising bus stops, eating out and learning new languages. In March 2021 she created this blog to inspire people cooking plant-based recipes. If she is not cooking, she is hiking, travelling or doing something else with her life.

); }
